snippet: The experimental musician Theo Bleckmann has released an album of Kate Bush’s songs, one of a series of projects that could raise awareness of this German-born singer.
abstract: Experimental musician Theo Bleckmann releases an album of cover songs by Kate Bush, one of a series of projects that could raise awareness of the German-born singer.
lead_paragraph: The experimental musician Theo Bleckmann has released an album of Kate Bush’s songs, one of a series of projects that could raise awareness of this German-born singer.

headline.seo: Theo Bleckmann Performs Kate Bush Songs
headline.main: Singer of Art-Rock and Bach (a Yodeler, Too)
headline.print_headline: Singer of Art-Rock and Bach (a Yodeler, Too)
